name: Space Blues
description:
A 2D Dog fighting, shoot em up game. Where you battle the Red Invaders, a red themed alien strike force. Choose your weapon, each come with a unique mechanic that will influence your game play, then join the Blue Alliance in the battle to protect your planet!

Controls

Arrow Keys - Directional Movement

X - Fire Weapon

A game made in 3 months by 3 university students as their first official game.
